name: Jvia
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: You're not getting older, you're timeless <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: Right, that's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click this line, if you want to watch it again.
